meanings.definition: To write without stopping or censoring oneself.
meanings.sent1: I like to freewrite in my journal every morning.
meanings.sent2: She decided to freewrite a poem about her feelings.
meanings.sent3: The students were asked to freewrite a story using only one word per sentence.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts freewrite onto the paper like a flowing river.
meanings.sent5: Freewriting allows me to express myself freely without overthinking.

meanings.definition: A piece of writing done in this manner.
meanings.sent1: I found an old freewrite in my notebook from last year.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to share our freewrites with the class.
meanings.sent3: His freewrite was filled with spelling errors, but it captured his emotions well.
meanings.sent4: The freewrite was a raw outpouring of the author's inner thoughts.
meanings.sent5: Reading her freewrite felt like peeking into her unfiltered mind.
